claimReward(address).details: Reward amount should be multiplied by 10^18

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused(address).details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

requestToUnstakeLpToken(address,uint256).details: Should be used if min wait time is non-zero

stakeLpToken(address,uint256).details: Farming should exist for that token and not paused

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateRewardPerDay(address,uint256).details: This value could be only updated few times since the contract      may run out of gas for calculating the interest

addLpToken(uint256,address,uint256,uint2.notice: Start farming for a LP token

balanceOf(address,address).notice: Return number of staked LP token of a user

getRewardOfUser(address,address).notice: Return farmed TST of an account

instantUnstakeLpToken(address,uint256).notice: Unstake LP token if there is no min wait time

pause(address).notice: Pause depositing for a LP token

setUnlockRequestDeadline(address,uint256.notice: Set the deadline for unstaking LP tokens after the

stakeLpToken(address,uint256).notice: Stake LP token to farm TST

stop(address).notice: Stop farming for a liquidity pool

totalRewardFromStart(address).notice: Return farmed TST amount from the start of farming

totalRewardInPeriod(address,uint256,uint.notice: Return farmed TST amount during a period for all stakers

unpause(address).notice: Unpause depositing of a LP token

unstakeLpToken(address,uint256,uint256,b.notice: Unstake LP token after the wait time is passed

updateRewardPerDay(address,uint256).notice: Update the reward per day for a LP token
